businessProfile.name: Sam's Ristorante & Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 6075 E Riverside Blvd #4413, Rockford, IL 61114, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 6075 E Riverside Blvd #4413, Rockford, IL 61114, USA

reviews.text: Had a great dinner. Started with fried mushrooms which were the crunchiest we ever had. I had grilled scallops and shrimp and he had veal saltimbocca. Great service. Would recommend to anyone looking for a nice quiet delicious dinner date.

We were there to celebrate a special birthday and we were not disappointed.The. food was delicious and plentiful. The wait staff was attentive, a special shout out to TJ who went above and beyond serving us.  We also had a delicious birthday cake. Gino worked with us to plan our menu which included a special meal for two vegan family members.  We had a very memorable time!

My husband and I stopped in Rockford/Loves Park after dropping our kids off at college.  Hoping to avoid yet another burger joint, we gave Sam‚Äôs Ristorante & Pizzeria a try.  Boy,  am I glad that we did!   The menu had so many great options to choose from so I needed assistance from our helpful and attentive waiter- Dante.  He recommended the Chicken Saltimbocca and it was absolutely amazing!  My husband got a meat lover‚Äôs pizza and also loved it.  We dined on the beautiful, screened in patio.  Highly recommend!

A bit disappointed with this restaurant because it had such nice reviews.  Currently, it is partially under remodeling, so it was awkward to find the right entrance. Our server was nice, friendly, but seemed to be a little bit in a rush to get us out of there and did not get our drink orders 100% correct the first time around. We ordered a cappuccino and it came on a tumbler glass, warm, not hot. We ordered a few dishes and a couple were in good portion size but the lasagna was really small.  Some of our dishes came barely warm and got cold really quick. Atmosphere of the restaurant was really nice. They actually had banquet rooms with wedding and birthday parties. Overall, it was a little pricey for the quantity and quality of the food.

Nicer atmosphere for a pizza restaurant.
Somewhat of an old school Vegas feel, from the decor to the music.
Service was excellent. Food was excellent.

editorial_summary.overview: Intimate, old-school red-sauce Italian joint serving a menu of pasta, pizza & classic entrees.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required

recentReviews.text: Love the new bar dining area and the front dining. Food was great beautiful ambiance. The extra surcharge for hospitality is a no go for me raise the food price . Thank you  we loved quality

We were there to celebrate a special birthday and we were not disappointed.The. food was delicious and plentiful. The wait staff was attentive, a special shout out to TJ who went above and beyond serving us.  We also had a delicious birthday cake. Gino worked with us to plan our menu which included a special meal for two vegan family members.  We had a very memorable time!

Not really kid friendly place but that's fine, live and learn, ordered one pizza and it took a very long time about 40 minutes to get the pizza despite there being only one other table of people in the restaurant. The cheese on the pizza is SO thick and stringy my kids couldn't eat it. It wasn't cut well, we asked to use a pizza cutter and were told it wasn't possible to use one..., the knives we had were serrated for steak and do not cut pizza well whatsoever. They gave our  young child a sprite in a normal tall adult size heavy glass and didn't have small kid cups with lids ? Not impressed with the food, it was a Sunday so maybe it's just the day and time
Great lunch, great service, great atmosphere! Definitely going to be a regular stop.

Had a great dinner. Started with fried mushrooms which were the crunchiest we ever had. I had grilled scallops and shrimp and he had veal saltimbocca. Great service. Would recommend to anyone looking for a nice quiet delicious dinner date.

My husband and I stopped in Rockford/Loves Park after dropping our kids off at college.  Hoping to avoid yet another burger joint, we gave Sam‚Äôs Ristorante & Pizzeria a try.  Boy,  am I glad that we did!   The menu had so many great options to choose from so I needed assistance from our helpful and attentive waiter- Dante.  He recommended the Chicken Saltimbocca and it was absolutely amazing!  My husband got a meat lover‚Äôs pizza and also loved it.  We dined on the beautiful, screened in patio.  Highly recommend!

My husband and I usually order out pizza. We ate in the newly remodeled screened in dining area tonight. The food was delicious. We were able to have a lovely dinner together as the sun was beginning to set. Ahmed was very attentive and helpful. He went above and beyond to make sure our experience was exceptional. Great food. Awesome service! Thank you.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Furstenau
detailedReviews.text: My Favorite Italian restaurant!

detailedReviews.author: Shawnie C
detailedReviews.text: The best!!!

detailedReviews.author: skipper bud
detailedReviews.text: Love the new bar dining area and the front dining. Food was great beautiful ambiance. The extra surcharge for hospitality is a no go for me raise the food price . Thank you  we loved quality

detailedReviews.author: Caren Samorian
detailedReviews.text: We were there to celebrate a special birthday and we were not disappointed.The. food was delicious and plentiful. The wait staff was attentive, a special shout out to TJ who went above and beyond serving us.  We also had a delicious birthday cake. Gino worked with us to plan our menu which included a special meal for two vegan family members.  We had a very memorable time!

detailedReviews.author: Ciara Ann
detailedReviews.text: Not really kid friendly place but that's fine, live and learn, ordered one pizza and it took a very long time about 40 minutes to get the pizza despite there being only one other table of people in the restaurant. The cheese on the pizza is SO thick and stringy my kids couldn't eat it. It wasn't cut well, we asked to use a pizza cutter and were told it wasn't possible to use one..., the knives we had were serrated for steak and do not cut pizza well whatsoever. They gave our  young child a sprite in a normal tall adult size heavy glass and didn't have small kid cups with lids ? Not impressed with the food, it was a Sunday so maybe it's just the day and time

detailedReviews.author: Doug Youmans
detailedReviews.text: Great lunch, great service, great atmosphere! Definitely going to be a regular stop.

detailedReviews.author: Janet Vlk
detailedReviews.text: Had a great dinner. Started with fried mushrooms which were the crunchiest we ever had. I had grilled scallops and shrimp and he had veal saltimbocca. Great service. Would recommend to anyone looking for a nice quiet delicious dinner date.

detailedReviews.author: kellie charles
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I stopped in Rockford/Loves Park after dropping our kids off at college.  Hoping to avoid yet another burger joint, we gave Sam‚Äôs Ristorante & Pizzeria a try.  Boy,  am I glad that we did!   The menu had so many great options to choose from so I needed assistance from our helpful and attentive waiter- Dante.  He recommended the Chicken Saltimbocca and it was absolutely amazing!  My husband got a meat lover‚Äôs pizza and also loved it.  We dined on the beautiful, screened in patio.  Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Terri Adell Anderson
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I usually order out pizza. We ate in the newly remodeled screened in dining area tonight. The food was delicious. We were able to have a lovely dinner together as the sun was beginning to set. Ahmed was very attentive and helpful. He went above and beyond to make sure our experience was exceptional. Great food. Awesome service! Thank you.

detailedReviews.author: Pam Mackinder
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food, Lovely atmosphere, fabulous service.  We will be back.

detailedReviews.author: david callender
detailedReviews.text:
Wow, this place has jacked up some serious prices:
1. Got charged $4 for soda water
2. Got charged $3.75 for brocilli that I did jot even order
3. Gluten free roll was $4
4. They charged $3 extra for gluten free pasta...bullcrap expense.
And to top it off they added a 3% "hospitality fee" for a party of 2. (Very sneaky) to add this in.

What the heck is going on here. Never heard of a hospitality fee.

Stay away from this place or be prepared to get price gouged.

I will never go back here again.

detailedReviews.author: madalynn diderich
detailedReviews.text: We cant thank Sam‚Äôs enough for everything they did for us on our wedding day and the year leading up to it . Gino is so easy to talk to and always made time for a quick phone call or an in person meeting . The staff day of we‚Äôre also amazing, efficient and very friendly. Always checking in and making sure they were available to us for anything we needed, clearing plates , ect . Food was incredible , guest wouldn‚Äôt stop raving about it ! I would highly recommend Sam‚Äôs for any event you‚Äôre looking for or just a quick stop in to get a bite . Thank you guys again for everything!

detailedReviews.author: Lily Picot
detailedReviews.text: This is our 4th time visiting Sam's for dinner, and most recently, trivia and dinner. The service and food is outstanding. The bar and patio remodel is beautiful.  The patio needs some shades around dinner time on the west side to cut down on the heat and glare otherwise it was a great experience. We'll be back!

detailedReviews.author: Lovely Midwest
detailedReviews.text: Delicious all around meal. Two specials, 2 drinks for $66, can‚Äôt beat that price. Beautiful decor. Eggplant boat pictured.

detailedReviews.author: patricia tyska
detailedReviews.text: Sam's has the most delicious, juicy, fresh, pizza !! Outstanding every time. Everything on the menu is absolutely amazing! I just had a ribeye there and  O M G!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Zellers
detailedReviews.text:
Our server was pleasant, took our order, came back to see if we wanted dessert.
Prices weren't bad.  Hospitality fee was added to bill
Three people came to see if we were ready to pay the bill.  We had paid the second
It was only 5:15/5:30 when we arrived.
There was cheese oil and plates on table for apps or bread .  Not even bread was offered.
Wont be back

detailedReviews.author: Vicky Brown
detailedReviews.text: Great food, fast delivery

detailedReviews.author: jenaphura1974
detailedReviews.text: We love our friday nights. It's spooky shows and Sam's pizza night. The restaurant and delivery team is solid, pizzas are hot, and they have good gluten free pizza crust. If you are looking for a nice date night spot, go check out their newly remodeled space. The fettuccine alfredo is amazing, and reheats like a dream. Supporting a local business never tastes so good.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Baxter
detailedReviews.text: We ordered pizza.  Was hot and tasty. Love the pizza sauce. Ingredients were fresh but from a can. Thank you

detailedReviews.author: kelly kirkpatrick gallagher
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza, pasta and martinis! We love the atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Asia Herron
detailedReviews.text: We had family members visit for a size of 24 guess and they called us back asked was we coming to dine in and they had i table ready service was good the workers where wonderful thats are second visiting years ago we had a old school party there it was awesome thanks again!

detailedReviews.author: Gordy Michaelson
detailedReviews.text: Update. This review is totally honest and the owner will not be able to get it removed. I have already spoken with Google. I was door dashing here and they were very unprofessional towards me for no apparent reason. Almost to the point of hostility. Haha it's cool they blocked me on DD. Super condescending almost like he thought he was better than me. I wouldn't eat here if you don't want to feel rushed. This is an honest review.

detailedReviews.author: Patricia
detailedReviews.text: Fabulous dining experience.  Gorgeous interior design. Excellent service. And every dish is absolutely delicious. Also, prices are reasonable. The only restaurant I know of where you can dress formally or fashionably casual.

detailedReviews.author: Maritza Crespo
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is really good,  amazing flavor! I order also a Moscow mule and a tiramisu and was amazing. Love it!

detailedReviews.author: Sara Omara
detailedReviews.text: First time picking up and the pizza was perfect!!!

detailedReviews.author: Lori Drummond
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful for celiacs!

detailedReviews.author: Chuck Marino
detailedReviews.text: The food food and service was great. I highly recommend for a private dinner or a party. We had a party of 23 and everything turned out great.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Peterson
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely amazing!! Everything was perfect, food and caring staff!! We went on a very busy night and they took wonderful care of us!

detailedReviews.author: Julie Lindberg
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and enjoyed the screened in patio seating on a beautiful summer night.

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Lasky
detailedReviews.text: We were having a Celebration of Life for my husband who recently passed away. We ordered primarily finger foods so people could come and go, staying as long as they liked. The room was set up nicely and the food served on time and replenished as needed. The tables were cleared of used dishes as people finished eating. The food was appealing and everything tasted good. We had a lot of leftovers which were boxed up nicely for us. I would recommend Sam‚Äôs for any similar occasion.

detailedReviews.author: Jan Boomgarden
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I love Sam‚Äôs. We order delivery from them quite often and visit the restaurant several times a year.

detailedReviews.author: Aubri owens
detailedReviews.text: We came in with a very big party and drinks were served right away for us when we sat down it took maybe 20 minutes for all the food to come mind you we had over 30 people in our party they were so so sweet and fast we will come again

detailedReviews.author: Art Landen
detailedReviews.text: Good food at a fair price with great service.

detailedReviews.author: Isaac Ernzen
detailedReviews.text: I always tip when I dine in and have good service. If I am driving to pickup a takeout order I'm not tipping. Dude at the counter had the gall to say something under his breath as I was walking out with my takeout order. Won't be going back as there are so many other better options for pizza in this area

detailedReviews.author: Angela Pennell
detailedReviews.text: When someone attends a wedding, they will always remember the food! I received compliments all evening about the quality of the food. In my family, good Italian food is love. Everyone at Sam‚Äôs made the entire process from planning, to delivery seamless. Thank you everyone at Sam‚Äôs Ristorante & Pizzeria !

detailedReviews.author: Debra Henning
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service! Food was awesome! Highly recommend going to this restaurant. Beautiful renovations!!!

detailedReviews.author: Sara Anderson
detailedReviews.text: Very fast and excellent delivery with Ryan.

detailedReviews.author: r sturdy
detailedReviews.text: Just Awesome customer service!Great Pizza.Son was visiting Dad's grave site in Rockford so the manager made pizza for us to take back to southern Illinois.This was done before restaurant opened.So thankful!!!!%gis is the place to go for your Italian needs for sure

detailedReviews.author: Kim Jacobsen
detailedReviews.text: Love this Place

detailedReviews.author: Alix Villiere
detailedReviews.text: I added a photo of the atmosphere, as the food was too delicious to worry about my camera or phone. Had 2 kids with us and were treated equally. Top 3 Greatest restaurant experiences ever.

detailedReviews.author: Tasha Spears
detailedReviews.text: Food was amazing! We had the Greek salad, special pizza, and Tiramisu! Highly recommend! Ahmad was super friendly and attentive! Thanks for a great experience

detailedReviews.author: Valerie Fries
detailedReviews.text: We hosted our daughter‚Äôs bridal shower. We had our own private room and all the accommodations were better than expected. I would recommend Sam‚Äôs to anyone looking for a venue to host a party

detailedReviews.author: Julie Hanvey
detailedReviews.text:
Fantastic service - quick service - friendly staff
We had 40 people and had our food quickly!

detailedReviews.author: Joanna Theismann
detailedReviews.text: We had a large group that was wonderfully accommodated. The food was very good, and the service was fantastic. Definitely will visit again!

detailedReviews.author: Lori Barganier
detailedReviews.text: We had a large party of 40, the manager was very understanding when I had to change the number of people 3 times. We had dedicated servers who got everything right, the food came out all together and tasted delicious!  Compliments to the chef and the staff.

detailedReviews.author: Cassandra Hardy
detailedReviews.text: Friendly staff and great food!

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Torres
detailedReviews.text: We had my nieces grad dinner here and Vanessa was our waitress. SHE WAS AMAZING! We were a large party and they were incredibly accommodating! I asked for my shrimp to be grilled for my Alfredo and it was the best thing! Thank you so much for everything!!

detailedReviews.author: Darrin Salzman
detailedReviews.text: The new patio seating and booths in the bar area are super nice.  The food is always really, really good.  I would highly recommend to anyone who has not been to Sam‚Äôs for a while!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer
detailedReviews.text:
Privacy
Quiet
Great Experience and Great Choices

detailedReviews.author: Greg Warner
detailedReviews.text: Great food! Great Service! Great Atmosphere! Gorgeous modern decor!!

detailedReviews.author: kay lottie
detailedReviews.text: THEY ARE VERY RACIST THEY WOULD NOT DELIVER TO ME AND I HAVE A 2 month old baby with me every time I called he hung up in my face and started yelling at me from the beginning the customer service is terrible then said I couldn‚Äôt make a order to pick it up I have to come in mind you I have a baby with me so we would have to wait this is crazy

detailedReviews.author: dtn 1601
detailedReviews.text: We have become regular on Friday night and love Jean the bartender, she makes my husband the best old fashioned and the food is always delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Brenda Vega
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious! Sam's Pizza on Riverside nails it every time‚Äîperfect crust, fresh toppings, and unbeatable flavor. A must-try!

detailedReviews.author: Katherine Weber
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!

detailedReviews.author: stefanie
detailedReviews.text: Always appreciate the Amazing service at the E.Riverside location! Not to mention, the food is Always great, no matter what you choose!!

detailedReviews.author: Jan Dyal
detailedReviews.text:
We hosted a baby shower at Sam‚Äôs on Riverside the Saturday before Easter.
Everything was remarkable. The room was set up very nicely (there was even a beautiful window in the room!). The service was efficient and prompt. The pizza, pasta, salad,  and fruit were delicious. There were no surprise charges or fees. I would definitely book another celebration at Sam‚Äôs. We were very pleased. Our guests were all impressed with Sam‚Äôs also! Five stars!!!! ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: amber Johnson
detailedReviews.text: My order came without the fries as ordered, but the driver brought them back out. Thank you! My 5 year old daughter was really wanting them!

detailedReviews.author: Sandra Linquist
detailedReviews.text: We didn't get a chance to be seated. A waiter told me they were very busy and couldn't seat us right away. I used to work in restaurants and understand how busy it can't get. We sat at the bar for about 15 or 20 minutes. They were terribly understaffed. I saw one waitress in the dining room and a waiter/ bartender in the bar area. There may have been more wait staff but I didn't see them. No one looked at us nor talked to us. Never got seated and were completely ignored. We left. I think the waiter/ bartender wanted us to. Won't be back.

detailedReviews.author: Wes Slay
detailedReviews.text:
Nicer atmosphere for a pizza restaurant.
Somewhat of an old school Vegas feel, from the decor to the music.
Service was excellent. Food was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Myra Wright
detailedReviews.text:
Just lovely! Food was amazing!! ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
This was our first time here but not our last!!

detailedReviews.author: Randy Nielson
detailedReviews.text: I get the reasons why large groups and split tickets get an automatic gratuity but not a fan of the practice.  Really the only negative.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay Warren
detailedReviews.text: Great food! Great environment

detailedReviews.author: Guenter McBuenter
detailedReviews.text:
Spent over $50 and still couldn't redeem the "free 10" cheese pizza with orders over $35" deal because I was dine-in, for some reason despite the website saying it was valid for dine in, carry out, or delivery.

All in all, delicious pizza, and I love Sam's but I might wait until the remodeling is done.

detailedReviews.author: Jackie Cosio
detailedReviews.text: Joe was great. The pizza was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Ellen Hazzard
detailedReviews.text: We had a group of about 22 tonight of retired RMH imagining group.   The service was fabulous and the food was great!   Thank you se very very much .

detailedReviews.author: Paul Dreska
detailedReviews.text: The food was very good

detailedReviews.author: Cindy L
detailedReviews.text: At first the  room was not available but they accommodated us with a bigger room.  Vanessa the waitress was the best .  Thanks Vanessa

detailedReviews.author: Maryann Lashock
detailedReviews.text: Time after time the best pizza around!

detailedReviews.author: Bill Polansky
detailedReviews.text: I feel Sam's has a 5 star thin pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: KD
detailedReviews.text: Sam‚Äôs I had to say let us down. Unfortunately I had to send the lasagna back the taste and the presentation was not up to Sam‚Äôs standards. I don‚Äôt know if the remodeling has anything to do with it. But my sister who was visiting from out of town said the same thing. She prefers the Charles st location.

detailedReviews.author: Alison Fuller
detailedReviews.text: Thank you for accomodating our large group!! We appreciate the wonderful service!!

detailedReviews.author: Marlene Hentschel
detailedReviews.text: This was fantastic for our event.  We had a 25 person memorial service to honor my mother.  We were able to use a television screen for a slideshow.  They had a podium to use for the speakers.    The food was amazing and right on schedule.  The use of the small banquet room was included in the price of the food.   I was able to have peace of mind that the venue was reserved well in advance of the event.  Our family and friends had a great time.

detailedReviews.author: Bob Vilsoet
detailedReviews.text: Terrific food, excellent service (Vanessa).  This time .. Fettuccine Alfredo (yummy) and chicken parmesan...

detailedReviews.author: Dana Kruse
detailedReviews.text: Great cauliflower crust pizza.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the beautiful ambiance and newly remodeled dining areas, including the screened-in patio, which enhance their dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The attentive and exceptional service provided by staff members like TJ, Dante, and Ahmed is frequently praised, making dining experiences special and memorable. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The menu offers a wide variety of delicious options, including standout dishes like Chicken Saltimbocca and juicy, fresh pizza, which consistently impress customers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, such as complaints about hospitality fees and poor customer service - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and understaffing concerns, leading to poor customer experiences - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Confusion and dissatisfaction with pricing and promotions, such as unexpected charges and unredeemable deals - social media marketing can improve this area

It was only 5:15/5:30 when we arrived.

Spent over $50 and still couldn't redeem the "free 10" cheese pizza with orders over $35" deal because I was dine-in, for some reason despite the website saying it was valid for dine in, carry out, or delivery.

All in all, delicious pizza, and I love Sam's but I might wait until the remodeling is done.

negative.text: Not really kid friendly place but that's fine, live and learn, ordered one pizza and it took a very long time about 40 minutes to get the pizza despite there being only one other table of people in the restaurant. recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
